original_text: And the people shall be as the burnings of lime: as thorns cut up shall they be burned in the fire.
korean_text: 민족들은 불에 굽는 횟돌 같겠고 잘라서 불에 사르는 가시나무 같으리로다

sentences.original_text: And the people shall be as the burnings of lime:
sentences.korean_translation: 백성은 석회를 태우는 것과 같게 되리라:

sentences.original_text: shall they be burned in the fire.
